entries.abort: What the.. we're not done here yet!
entries.arrival_phase_1: Alright, uploading the coordinates of our spies disabled ship.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Proceed quickly to the location pilot. The Inquisitions frigate is closing in on him.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.complete: Good work pilot, stand by for further orders.
entries.docking_complete: So far so good. Take the spy to safety pilot.
entries.docking_started: Dock with our operative and transfer the repair tools to his ship.
entries.failed_destroy: Damnation! We lost our operative! Stand by...
entries.panic_1: I guess they have given up on the idea of capturing me alive.
entries.panic_2: Wish I had a real ship and not this piece of junk.
entries.panic_3: Here they come, lets give them a warm welcome.
entries.panic_5: I wonder if there's a tracker on this ship, they seem to know our exact location.
entries.quest_dock_d: Dock with the spies ship and transfer the spare parts and repair tools. Defend his ship while he's performing the repairs.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort our spy while he's calculating his jump to lightspeed.
entries.quest_location_d: The Dathomir system is always dangerous, even for hardened veterans like yourself. No one but the most elite of pilots (or the most dumb but they are in minority and won't live for long) go here, which makes it a hostile environment indeed.
entries.recovery_success: He's safe from there, good job pilot.
entries.rescue_abandoned: What the.. we're not done here yet!
entries.rescue_phase_1: Good to see you pilot, thought this would be my last mission.
entries.rescue_phase_2: Alright, I should be up and running in a few seconds.
entries.split_quest_alert: Brother Extok Evin: < Our reconnaissance ship reports that an Inquisitor is getting ready to hyperspace after our spy, you must stop him! >
entries.split_quest_alert_fail: Brother Extok Evin: < Ack, we have lost contact with our operative. The brave soul didn't go in vain though, he managed to transfer most of his data to your ship before his demise. Stand by. >
entries.taunt_1: You're not going anywhere Rebel fools!
entries.taunt_2: No one escapes the Imperial Inquisition!
entries.taunt_3: You know your orders men, if we can't capture them, we destroy them!
entries.taunt_4: Waging war on the Inquisition is suicide you Rebel scum!
entries.taunt_5: You can't win this battle Rebels, surrender now and we will show mercy!
entries.thanks_1: Well we showed them, didn't we?
entries.thanks_3: No one captures Trova Ruaw, no one!
entries.thanks_4: Whow, you are good pilot, very good.
entries.thanks_5: Alright, lets not stick around and wait for more.
entries.title: Dathomir system: Save a Vortex operative.
entries.title_d: One of our spies have had a malfunction on his ship and is drifting through Dathomir space with the Inquisition quickly closing in on him. You need to get to him fast with repair materials and escort him to safety.
